title: First Look: Hope Technology’s UK Made Vibration Damping Carbon Gravel Cranks
content:
Hope Technology bring their vibration damping technology from MTB to the world of drop handlebars, with the $695 RX Carbon Cranks

Read the full article at First Look: Hope Technology’s UK Made Vibration Damping Carbon Gravel Cranks on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
